item.title: Please help. No one has helped the past two times.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

ummmmmmm how about

if (playerCommand.startsWith("exchange")) { int hasitem = 1; if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(2996, hasitem)) { c.sendMessage("You don't have any tickets!"); } else { for (int i = 0; i < 50000000; i++) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2996, i)) { c.pkPoints += 10; c.getItems().deleteItem2(2996, i); } } } }

item.title: Please help. No one has helped the past two times.[PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Posted this earlier, got no help. THIS IS THE SECOND TIME I HAVE RE-POSTED THIS!
I need to make a command that checks how many tickets I have, then gives me pk points for the tickets, and takes them away. I have this command that I DID NOT make.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("exchange")) { int hasitem = 1; if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(2996, hasitem)) { c.sendMessage("You don't have any tickets!"); return; } c.pkPoints += 10; c.getItems().deleteItem(2996, 1); }

I want it to check how many tickets I have, and give me the correct amount of points for it. Thanks.

Read full topic
